name: Millet Murukku
description: Savour the authentic taste of tradition with Millet Murukku, a delicious and healthy snack made from the goodness of organic millets. This crunchy treat is expertly crafted using a traditional recipe.

name: Millet Thengolu
description: Indulge in the wholesome goodness of Millet Thengolu, a delightful snack made with the finest organic millets. Crafted from a traditional recipe, this crispy treat is the perfect blend of taste and health.
